title: CLAUDE.md Documentation Errors
description: Made incorrect changes to CLAUDE.md without following protocols, including adding servers that weren't configured and removing working documentation
solution: Fixed incorrect script path from claude-startup-check.js to check-graph-status.js, added missing E2E test commands (test:e2e, test:e2e:headed, test:e2e:debug, test:e2e:ui, test:e2e:auth) and sitemap commands (sitemap:generate, sitemap:submit, sitemap:monitor) that exist in package.json but were undocumented
